description: You are given a 2D array of integers coordinates of length n and an integer k, where 0 <= k < n. coordinates[i] = [xi, yi] indicates the point (xi, yi) in a 2D plane. An increasing path of length m is defined as a list of points (x1, y1), (x2, y2), (x3, y3), ..., (xm, ym) such that: Return the maximum length of an increasing path that contains coordinates[k].
